description: NBC News’ Steve Kornacki breaks down voter turnout numbers across races in NYC, New Jersey and Virginia.
title: Steve Kornacki: Where voter turnout set records

author: Camila Bernal
description: Minutes before a 10-hour surgical procedure, 8-year-old Olivia Olson sat on a hospital bed grinning.
title: Their daughter needed reconstructive surgery. They got an insurance fight.

description: Philadelphia restaurants hit with fake one-star reviews
title: Philadelphia restaurants hit with fake one-star reviews

description: The government shutdown is now the longest in American history — breaking the record set during President Trump’s first term. NBC News’ Sahil Kapur reports on the impacts of the record-breaking standoff between President Trump and Democratic leaders.
title: How the impact of government shutdown could snowball

description: At least nine people were killed and 11 others were injured after a UPS plane crashed in Louisville, Kentucky. NTSB officials said that CCTV footage captured the left engine detaching from the wing of the plane during takeoff.
title: NTSB says footage shows left engine detaching from wing during takeoff before deadly UPS crash

description: Family of Itay Chen relieved as Hamas returns his body
title: Family of Itay Chen relieved as Hamas returns his body

description: Tom Brady reveals his dog is a clone of his late pet
title: Tom Brady reveals his dog is a clone of his late pet

description: Boy fighting cancer sworn in as police chief for a day
title: Boy fighting cancer sworn in as police chief for a day

author: Natasha Korecki
description: Residents of Chicago suburbs underscored in interviews that immigration enforcement agents have been the catalyst for chaos and clashes in their neighborhoods.
title: Chicago residents say immigration enforcement is leading to children getting tear-gassed

author: Bracey Harris
description: George Barnett, a pastor and avid hunter, shot the rhesus monkey out of a tree in Vossburg, Mississippi, on his way to visit his mother on Monday.
title: Small-town preacher shoots one of last lab monkeys that escaped Mississippi crash

description: One of three monkeys that escaped from an overturned truck on a Mississippi highway was shot after a couple spotted it and tracked into a forest near Vossburg, Miss. George Barnett and his wife recounted the episode on video as a group tasked with tracking down the monkeys later showed up to secure its remains.
title: Mississippi couple recounts shooting incident with an escaped monkey

description: President Trump spoke about the election to GOP senators, saying, "I don't think it was good for Republicans," and adding he believes the government shutdown was a factor in the losses for the party.
title: Trump says shutdown was a factor in GOP losses

author: Megan Lebowitz
description: Democrats added at least 10 seats in the Virginia House of Delegates, building on the party's wins in the top statewide elections and more broadly across the country, The Associated Press projected
title: Democrats expand majority in Virginia House of Delegates, building on statewide wins

description: Government shutdown is now longest in U.S. history
title: Government shutdown is now longest in U.S. history

description: Dramatic video shows UPS plane crashing during takeoff
title: Dramatic video shows UPS plane crashing during takeoff

description: Hours after the polls closed, NBC News' Steve Kornacki takes a look at how President Trump's job approval rating, according to election exit polls, matched up with voters' decisions — and what that datapoint could indicate ahead of the 2026 midterms.
title: Kornacki: This data could be ominous for GOP in 2026

description: Devastating video shows the moment a UPS cargo plane crashed in Louisville, Kentucky, shortly after takeoff creating a massive fireball and spreading to several businesses on the ground. Officials confirm nine people were killed, including all three crew members on board. NBC’s Adrienne Broaddus reports for TODAY.
title: UPS Cargo Plane Crashes After Takeoff Leaves 9 People Dead

description: Devastating video shows the moment a UPS cargo plane crashed in Louisville, Kentucky, shortly after takeoff creating a massive fireball and spreading to several businesses on the ground. Officials say seven people were killed, including all three crew members on board. NBC’s Adrienne Broaddus reports for TODAY.
title: UPS Cargo Plane Crashes After Takeoff Leaving at Least 7 Dead

description: As the government shutdown officially stands as the longest in United States history, long lines and delays are piling up at airports across the United States. Now, Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy is warning that parts of the airspace could close due to staff shortages in air traffic control towers. NBC’s Garrett Haake reports for TODAY from the White House.
title: Government Shutdown Becomes Longest in US History

description: Two killed in U.S. strike on alleged drug boat
title: Two killed in U.S. strike on alleged drug boat

author: Owen Auston-Babcock
description: Democrats Christian Menefee and Amanda Edwards advanced to a runoff in a special congressional election in Texas, NBC News projects, as a crowded field vied to fill the late Rep.
title: Two Democrats advance to a special election runoff for a deep-blue Texas House seat

author: Jay Ganglani
description: HONG KONG — An American teacher and his teenage son have been stung to death while on holiday in Laos
title: American teacher and son stung to death in Laos

description: Dozens dead after Typhoon Kalmaegi hits the Philippines
title: Dozens dead after Typhoon Kalmaegi hits the Philippines

author: Lawrence Hurley
description: The Supreme Court will weigh whether President Donald Trump has the authority to impose sweeping tariffs on imports under a law designed for use during a national emergency.
title: Trump tariffs showdown reaches the Supreme Court

author: Rob Wile
description: The Supreme Court weighs the legality of tariffs that have raised costs on clothing, toys, cars, liquor and much more.
title: What's at stake for the economy as the Supreme Court weighs Trump's tariffs

author: Daryna Mayer
description: Ukrainian troops have launched helicopter raids and counteroffensives to try and ease the pressure on a key eastern city, as the Kremlin seeks a crucial battlefield victory with the U.S. push for peace shelved.
title: Surrender to save yourselves, Russia urges Ukrainian troops squeezed in key city

description: Officials say at least seven people were killed after a UPS plane crashed during takeoff at the Muhammad Ali International Airport in Louisville, Kentucky. NBC News’ Tom Costello has the details.
title: At least seven dead after UPS plane crashes during takeoff

description: Officials say at least seven killed in UPS plane crash
title: Officials say at least seven killed in UPS plane crash

description: Newsom says Prop 50 win sends powerful message to Trump
title: Newsom says Prop 50 win sends powerful message to Trump

description: Steve Kornacki joins “Here’s the Scoop” to share his biggest takeaway from election night. Listen to “Here’s the Scoop” wherever you get your podcasts.
title: Steve Kornacki’s biggest takeaway from election night

author: The Politics Desk
description: Democrats scored a series of victories across the country Tuesday on the first major Election Day of President Donald Trump’s second term.
title: Democrats sweep the night's biggest elections: From the Politics Desk

author: Matt Dixon
description: No one thought Tuesday was going to be Donald Trump’s election night, but there were even fewer silver linings than many Republicans had hoped.
title: Republicans look for lessons in an election dominated by Democratic wins

description: Mamdani addresses Trump during victory speech
title: Mamdani addresses Trump during victory speech

description: NBC News’ Jane Timm joins “Here’s the Scoop” to discuss California’s vote on Proposition 50 — and what it may mean for Democrats in the redistricting fight. Listen to “Here’s the Scoop” wherever you get your podcasts.
title: What’s next in the redistricting fight?

description: NBC News’ Sam Brock reports from Zohran Mamdani’s election night headquarters, where supporters are gathered to celebrate the NYC mayoral candidate’s projected win.
title: Inside Mamdani HQ on election night

description: NBC News’ Steve Kornacki joins “Here’s the Scoop” to break down just how big of a margin Zohran #Mamdani won over voters under 45 years old, compared to opponent Andrew Cuomo.
title: Kornacki breaks down young voter support for Mamdani

description: In his victory speech, Zohran Mamdani refused "to apologize" for his identity, adding that "convention has held us back."
title: Mamdani says Democrats will leave ‘mediocrity’ behind

description: Democrat Zohran Mamdani thanked his supporters in a a victory speech after his projected win in the New York City mayoral race defeating former Gov. Andrew Cuomo. Mamdani went on to wish Cuomo well, but said it was the final time he'd "utter his name."
title: Zohran Mamdani: 'you have dared to reach for something greater'

description: Zohran Mamdani: 'We have toppled a political dynasty'
title: Zohran Mamdani: 'We have toppled a political dynasty'

description: Cuomo delivers concession speech after projected loss
title: Cuomo delivers concession speech after projected loss

description: Sherrill thanks supporters after projected win
title: Sherrill thanks supporters after projected win

description: Voters in California today approved a ballot measure — Prop 50 — that will allow state leaders to redraw congressional district lines in a partisan fashion, which could lead to a guarantee for Democrats to gain five House seats in next year's midterm elections, NBC News projects.
title: California voters approve Prop 50, NBC News projects

author: Ben Kamisar
description: California voters have approved a new congressional map drawn by state Democrats, NBC News projects, giving the party the chance to gain up to five House seats in next year’s midterm elections and counter Republican redistricting efforts in other states
title: California voters approve Democratic-drawn congressional map

description: Steve Kornacki looks at how results in the NYC mayoral race compare to recent polls following Zohran Mamdani’s projected win.
title: Kornacki: How Mamdani could get 50% of the vote

description: NBC News' Steve Kornacki explains how Zohran Mamdani's projected win over Andrew Cuomo signals the end of the Cuomo dynasty that started with his father, former New York Governor Mario Cuomo.
title: The dynasty that started with Cuomo's father ends

description: Assemblyman Zohran Mamdani, a 34-year-old democratic socialist whose meteoric rise captivated New York City, beat out former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo to become city's next mayor, NBC News projects.
title: Mamdani wins NYC mayoral race, NBC News projects

description: Democrat Mikie Sherrill wins the New Jersey governor’s race, turning back a push from Republicans to build on President Trump’s gains in the state, NBC News projects.
title: Sherrill wins N.J. governor’s race, NBC News projects

author: Megan Lebowitz
description: Democrat Jay Jones has won the election for Virginia attorney general, NBC News projects, overcoming a text message scandal that threatened to derail his candidacy in the final stretch of the race
title: Democrat Jay Jones wins Virginia AG race, overcoming backlash to his violent texts

description: Spanberger thanks supporters after projected win
title: Spanberger thanks supporters after projected win

author: Bridget Bowman
description: Democratic Rep. Mikie Sherrill won the New Jersey governor’s race, NBC News projects, defeating Republican Jack Ciattarelli after a hard-fought contest in which President Donald Trump loomed over voters’ choice
title: Democratic Rep. Mikie Sherrill wins New Jersey governor's race

description: UPS cargo plane crashes near Kentucky airport
title: UPS cargo plane crashes near Kentucky airport

author: Alexandra Marquez
description: Maine will soon become the 22nd state to have an “extreme risk protection” gun law, also known as a “red flag law,” NBC News projects — part of a slew of state ballot measures voters around the country considered Tuesday, on issues from raising taxes on higher earners to parental rights and voting rules
title: Maine voters approve 'red flag' gun laws, while Texas enshrines parental rights

description: As NBC News projects Democrat Abigail Spanberger has defeated Republican Winsome Earle-Sears in the Virginia governor's race, NBC News' Steve Kornacki broke down the margins in the race.
title: What the margins show in VA governor race

description: NBC News projects Abigail Spanberger as the winner of the Virginia governor's race. NBC News’ Kristen Welker details how Spanberger’s messaging on the economy resonated with voters and earned her the win.
title: Abigail Spanberger wins Virginia governor's race, NBC News projects

description: Democrat Abigail Spanberger flips control of the Virginia governorship, becoming the first woman to lead the state, NBC News projects.
title: Spanberger wins Va. governor’s race, NBC News projects

description: NBC News’ Steve Kornacki breaks down exit polling on President Trump’s approval rating in Virginia, New Jersey, New York City and California.
title: Kornacki breaks down Trump approvals in exit polling

description: NBC News confirms the Trump administration is preparing to announce a deal to sell Wegovy and Zepbound for as little as $149 a month for the lowest doses, according to two people familiar with the plan. NBC News’ Anne Thompson reports.
title: White House nears deal to lower costs for popular weight loss drugs
